Name: oid
column6: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: opcmethod
column6: index access method operator class is for

Name: opcfamily
column6: operator family containing the operator class

Name: opcintype
column6: data type that the operator class indexes

Name: opcdefault
column6: true if this operator class is the default for opcintype

Name: opckeytype
column6: type of data stored in index, or zero if same as opcintype
